Description:
Sleek, modern stainless steel and tempered glass knife block compliments any kitchen and holds five select cutlery needed for a successful meal prep: 3.5" Paring, 5" Utility, 8" Chef's, 8" Bread, and 6" Boning.

Mercer's Genesis knife sets provide the innovative chef an efficient, safe, and smart means of always having Genesis fully forged, German steel cutlery at hand and make great gift items as well.
Name: Mercer Cutlery Genesis 6-Piece Knife Set with Tempered-Glass Bloc
